short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically mutes all active Twitch tabs except the one in focus.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension that listens for tabs playing audio from Twitch and only allows the active tab within the active window to play, muting all others.  I use it all the time when switching between multiple streams.
